content:
James A. Liu

  • Position: Graduate Student
  • Area: Theory - Algorithms and Data Structures
  • E-mail: jamesal1@ics.uci.edu
  • Github: https://github.com/jamesal1

About Me

I am a third year Ph.D. student in Computer Science. I am advised by Vijay Vazirani. My research interests include algorithmic game theory, deep generative modeling, and blockchain.

Education

University of California, Berkeley - December 2012
B.S. Engineering Mathematics and Statistics
University of California, Irvine - June 2019
M.S. Computer Science

Research

David Eppstein, Michael T. Goodrich, James A. Liu, Pedro A. Matias. Tracking Paths in Planar Graphs. ISAAC 2019.
James A Liu. Atomic Swaptions: Cryptocurrency Derivatives. Submitting to Stanford Blockchain Conference 2020. arXiv:1807.08644.

Information and Computer Science
University of California, Irvine
Irvine, CA 92697-3425
